channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘You need a third job or a rich husband’: I fell victim to Allen Stanford’s multibillion-dollar Ponzi scheme and survived
item.description: “If you have never found yourself in a situation where your life does a complete 180, it’s wrong to talk down to anyone.”

item.title: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
item.description: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”

item.title: Novo Nordisk first out of the gate with oral weight-loss drug, and its stock jumps
item.description: Relief rally underway in Novo Nordisk after a difficult year for the stock which saw it lose ground to arch-competitor Eli Lilly.

item.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
item.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

item.title: Does the stock market close early on Christmas Eve? Will banks be open?
item.description: Expect plenty of schedule changes for financial markets, mail service, federal offices and more during the coming days

item.title: How to prepare your portfolio for shocks and growth opportunities in 2026, according to UBS
item.description: Celebrate your 2025 winnings and then gear your portfolio for the new year.

item.title: Jefferies says international demand could fuel next leg of growth for this satellite imagery stock
item.description: The investment firm initiated the satellite imagery company at a buy rating.

item.title: Tuesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The three major averages posted a winning session on Monday, kicking off the holiday-shortened week on a positive note.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans

item.title: The charts show a possible breakout in this insurance stock, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Katie Stockton breaks down the charts on this insurer heading into 2026.

item.title: NYSE insider Jay Woods on the 'Magnificent Seven' stock that's breaking out into year-end
item.description: Jay Woods, chief market strategist at Freedom Capital Markets, will continue to keep an eye on Tesla.

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
